popup.CN: 挑战难度更高的地图来解锁新关卡和游戏模式。

tier_requirement.CN: 你需要先完成所有关卡，以及地图前面的难度等级。

popup.CN: 自定义设计挑战难度，决定如何获得金币，经验值，以及物品奖励。

challenge_0.CN: 敌人掉落精华减少 %s%% 。获得的金币量增加。

challenge_1.CN: 陷阱升级费用提高 %s%% 。获得的金币量增加。

challenge_2.CN: 你的角色初始最大生命值减少 %s%% 。获得的金币量增加。

challenge_3.CN: 敌人移动速度提升 %s%% 。掉落物品的品质提升。

challenge_4.CN: 你的角色最大法力值/怒气/专注减少 %s%% 。掉落物品的品质提升。

challenge_5.CN: 陷阱造成的伤害减少 %s%% 。掉落物品的品质提升。

challenge_6.CN: 敌人获得额外最大生命值 %s%% 。获得的经验值收益增加。

challenge_7.CN: 药水治疗效果降低 %s%% 。获得的经验值收益增加。

challenge_8.CN: 敌人被杀死后有 %s%% 几率重生。获得的经验值收益增加。

popup.CN: 结束这场战争只有一个办法，与无穷无尽的怪物战斗到最后一口气。争取在排行榜创造新的记录！

count.CN: 至少需要2名玩家加入才可以开始游戏

conditions.CN: 以下玩家不符合此地图的加入要求：

rclick_salvage_item.CN: 右键单击或拖放到此处， 来选择对一个物品进行回收。

rclick_upgrade_item.CN: 右键单击或拖放到此处， 来选择对一个神话物品进行升级。

select_item_to_upgrade.CN: 选择要升级的神话物品！

popup_locked.CN: 等级达到 55 级时，你将获得第一件神话物品奖励。

salvage_godlike.CN: 这是一件神话物品，你确定要回收吗？

searching_as_defender.CN: 正在搜寻对手（你作为防守方）...

searching_as_attacker.CN: 正在搜寻对手（你作为进攻方）...

searching_as_random.CN: 正在搜寻对手（随机阵营）....

speed.CN: 怪物移动速度和移动方式

damage.CN: 怪物造成的大门耐久破坏

delete_confirm.CN: 你确定要删除此地图吗？

download_required.CN: 所选的地图需要下载数据，你想现在下载吗？

waiting_others.CN: 下载完成。等待其他玩家

select_skill.CN: 选择一个技能或按下 ESC 键取消

reset_popup.CN: 右键点击需要重新分配点数的技能，重置每个技能点花费 200 金币。

TierProgress.CN: 还需要挑战%d个不同地图才能解锁。当前已完成%d个地图。

reset_popup.CN: 右键点击需要重新分配点数的技能图标，重置每个科技点花费200金币。

PotionType0.CN: 你目前拥有 %d 瓶生命药水。饮用一瓶药水将持续回复 50%% 最大生命值。

desc.CN: 目前拥有的物品
把重要的物品收藏在这里

popup.CN: 你身上目前携带的金币数量。可以在商店中消费，购买更好的装备。

desc.CN: 生命值决定了你的角色能承受多少伤害，当生命值降为0时，你的角色会死亡，然后等待重生。
攻击力决定你的角色对敌人造成的基本伤害，主要的伤害来源是你装备的武器。当你使用技能时，攻击力也用于计算造成的实际伤害。
护甲值决定你的角色受到伤害时，根据敌人等级以百分比形式减免物理伤害。取决于角色技能等级和已装备的物品。\n当前最多可减免%d%%物理伤害。
使用技能时会消耗专注。当你退出战斗状态时，它会逐渐恢复，并激活隐身技能。
释放技能时会消耗法力。消耗的法力值会随时间逐渐回复。
释放技能时会消耗怒气。与敌人战斗时，会持续获得怒气。
你对敌人造成的攻击有一定几率造成暴击。暴击将显著提高你的输出伤害。
暴击时造成的额外伤害。
你使用的冰系技能可以造成额外的伤害。
你使用的火系技能可以造成额外的伤害。
你使用的雷系技能可以造成额外的伤害。
你使用的毒系技能可以造成额外的伤害。
你使用的物理技能可以造成额外的伤害。
每当你杀死一名敌人时可以回复专注。
每当你杀死一名敌人时可以回复法力。
每当你杀死一名敌人时可以获得怒气。
你的角色每秒回复专注。
你的角色每秒回复法力值。
你的角色每秒获得怒气值。
你的角色每秒回复生命值。
你的角色有更大的机会可以获得魔法物品。
你的角色有更大的机会获得更多的金币。
你的角色可以更快频率的使用技能。
你的角色饮用药水时，获得的回复效果加成。
当你的角色被施加减益效果时（减速、眩晕、冻结），效果持续时间减少。
你的角色在移动时，可以走得更快。

physical_resistance_desc.CN: 当你的角色受到物理伤害时，可以减免部分伤害。取决于敌人等级，角色等级和已装备的物品。\n当前可减免 %d%% 物理伤害。

poison_resistance_desc.CN: 当你的角色受到毒系伤害时，可以减免部分伤害。取决于敌人等级，角色等级和已装备的物品。\n当前可减免 %d%% 毒素伤害。

fire_resistance_desc.CN: 当你的角色受到火焰伤害时，可以减免部分伤害。取决于敌人等级，角色等级和已装备的物品。\n当前可减免 %d%% 火焰伤害。

ice_resistance_desc.CN: 当你的角色受到冰冻伤害时，可以减免部分伤害。取决于敌人等级，角色等级和已装备的物品。\n当前可减免 %d%% 冰冻伤害。

lightning_resistance_desc.CN: 当你的角色受到闪电伤害时，可以减免部分伤害。取决于敌人等级，角色等级和已装备的物品。\n当前可减免 %d%% 闪电伤害。

popup.CN: 显示关于下一回合的信息

desc.CN: The fabled Darkmoor! I’ve studied the history of this place. A floating island once covered by lush gardens and beautiful glades, where the wealthy decadents of a lost age could enjoy the sight of the Inkheart swirling out there, in the void. But as one of the manifest points in the Ring, where Portals can appear during the cycles, the whole island was turned into one of the Deathtrap Strongholds. The side effects of arcane machines transformed the beautiful gardens into a haunted bog and the deadly skirmishes of the previous cycles destroyed all that what was left. I wish I could have seen it in its prime.

tier2.CN: Build Empower Beacons at the strategically important points of the map. They will enhance the damage dealt by your character and by the creatures you summon. The boosts of Empower Beacons in close vicinity always stack.

tier3.CN: You will face a selection of regenerating, healing monsters on this map. You can boost your chances of survival with the Revitaliser Beacons and Wind of Death traps.

tier4.CN: Beware: this map only allows you to use Mystic Ground Trap slots and some special traps unique to this level!

name.CN: 第 II 章 - Pale Keep

desc.CN: This place feels haunted, but at least it gives me some sense of protection. It’s comforting to see walls for a change, even if there isn’t much left of them. I shouldn’t be surprised. According to my notes, this place used to be a colossal fort built of the marble bones of some long-forgotten species of the Ink. And being one of the first Strongholds, constructed right before the first cycle, the constant swarms have already reduced it to rubble. Still, I’m fairly confident that it can withstand another tide of monstrosities if I can just use its defenses to my advantage.

tier2.CN: Make good use of the Whirlblade Columns located on this map, as they all deal massive damage to the monsters.

tier3.CN: Beware! This map has no Mystic Tower slots. Also, waves of monsters will vary between Horde and Armored creatures, so you might have to plan or rethink your trap building accordingly.

tier4.CN: This map has various clusters for Summoning trap slots. Try to build different kinds of traps there instead of piling up traps of the same type in one place.

name.CN: 第 III 章 - Forest of the Fallen

desc.CN: The First Swarm burst out of the Inkheart ages ago, before the Trapmakers had even began to experiment with the first arcane defensive mechanisms, so the Void Kingdoms had no choice but to gather a huge army to stop the monsters that were tearing through the portals of the Ring, destroying the islands one by one. According to our annals, the bloodiest battle took place here, where the armies eventually managed to stop the tide, but they paid a terrible price: these forests are still haunted by sad presence of the countless thousands who sacrificed their lives among the trees.

tier2.CN: The Pillars of Rejuvenation will heal your creatures and your character continuously. With these Pillars and some careful planning you can stand your ground for a very long time. The effect of the Pillars in close vicinity will stack.

tier3.CN: You will face fast moving groups of monsters on this map, who can easily overrun your defenses. Hook Grinders can cut their numbers down, Salvage Recyclers can provide the extra funds.

tier4.CN: This map has several nodes where the pathways converge. It could be useful to build your defenses accordingly. Apart from the special traps unique to this map, you can only use Mystic Tower traps and Mechanical Ground trap slots.

name.CN: 第 IV 章 - Bottomless Pit

desc.CN: The Ink is a treacherous realm, where reality twists into pockets of incredible anomalies. The closer you get to the Inkheart, the more disturbing these distorted realms become. Some of these ancient strongholds were constructed in the bowels of an infinite cave system that folds into itself and at some places the ground opens into the lightless void. Legends say that those monsters from the previous swarms who were cast into the depths are still falling and failed to touch bottom yet. Are they still alive? This is a question you might not want to ask before your next battle.

tier2.CN: Squash Traps can smash even the largest monsters into pulp. Try not to waste their potential.

tier3.CN: Beware! Flying monsters will take shortcuts on this map. Whirlblade Columns and Empower Beacons will help you to deal with the rest.

tier4.CN: This map has only Ground traps and Mechanical Tower slots. Bear in mind that the waves will include Armored and Flying creatures.

name.CN: 第 V 章 - Crystal Vaults

desc.CN: Just look at this colossal vault! This underground stronghold was built above a gaping chasm that opens straight into an entirely different world – or at least that’s what the ancient annals say. However, this is not what makes this fortress so unique. The scholars of a bygone era spent decades studying the crystals that still grow on the ledges and cliffs, only to discover that these glowing outgrowths absorbed the incredible arcane energies that once destroyed the Second Swarm. Sadly the methods of tapping into this power have been lost to us since then.

tier2.CN: The Imprisoned Golems will be your mighty allies in this battle, but you can only build them once: if their HP falls to zero, they'll be destroyed forever.

tier3.CN: You will encounter only Ranged attackers on this map. Use your Enhancer Beacons and Heat Ray Sentries wisely.

tier4.CN: Concentrate on the choke points scattered all over the map and build your defenses there. Try to keep an eye on the Giant creatures.

name.CN: 第 VI 章 - Nameless Tomb

desc.CN: Long before the First Swarm broke out of the black, pulsating heart of the Ink, the otherworld had been home to god-like creatures who waged wars among themselves for fun and erected grandiose monuments to herald their own greatness. This particular stronghold was built among the ruins of a colossal tomb dedicated to one of those inhuman generals of the lost age. According to the scholars of the Crawling Monastery, it should be a burial place, although no one has ever ventured deep enough to see if there was a crypt in the darkness. And judging by the macabre silence that fills these vaults, maybe it’s better this way.

tier2.CN: Build a lot of Enhancer Beacons in the same area: since these traps will boost the damage dealt by you traps, you should place as many as possible close to each other.

tier3.CN: Watch out: only Flying creatures will attack you on this map, and they will avoid the usual land routes to your Gate. Hook Grinders and Artillery Sentries will help you to deal with them.

tier4.CN: Beware! This map has no average trap slots at all! You can only build Artillery Sentry traps, although the number of available Artillery Sentries is quite big. Tip: try to gather as much Essence as you can.

name.CN: 第 VII 章 - Cave of Valor

desc.CN: The majestic ring of islands floating around the Inkheart was once a hub of leisure for the wealthy citizens of a long-lost civilization, since these plateaus offer breathtaking vistas of the churning, black chaos from a safe distance. Some of these islands, though, catered for visitors who craved for pleasures of a more decadent kind, and the arenas of crystal and marble hosted grandiose battles between gladiators. When the Trapmakers began to build their first strongholds, they decided to make good use of these abandoned vaults. Where once gladiators fought to death, now monsters die shrieking.

tier2.CN: With proper tactics the slow, but deadly Artillery Sentries can rain concentrated fire upon your enemies.

tier3.CN: This map is not for the faint-hearted. There are no regular monsters this time, only Champions will enter the arena. Keep your Imprisoned Golems in the fight!

tier4.CN: Attention! You can only use Mystic and Mechanical Ground Traps on this map. Be prepared for a large number of Armored creatures as well.

name.CN: 第 VIII 章 - Plateau of Decay

desc.CN: This is an eerie, haunted maze of colossal stone bridges and stairs that seem to lead nowhere. The historians of the Crawling Monastery believe that the Plateau was originally an ordinary floating island just like the others in the Ring around the Inkheart, but it was carved, shaped and sculpted until nothing else remained but a twisted, strange stone skeleton. The purpose of the endless rows of corroded chains and iron rings embedded in the walls is still unclear, but they certainly remind the visitors of a prison for inhuman creatures, shackled to the slabs floating above the void.

tier2.CN: Beware! This map doesn't allow you to build Tower Traps. Use the vicious Hook Grinders instead. Try to use Ground traps or clever tactics to make the best use of them.

tier3.CN: Flying creatures will take shortcuts to your gate, so make good use of Empower Beacons and Wind of Death traps.

tier4.CN: This map only has Mystic Tower slots and some Summoning slots. And watch out: there will be Flying creatures as well! Have fun.

name.CN: 第 IX 章 - Abandoned Laboratories

desc.CN: Some of the strongholds were built in the colossal vaults where the Trapmakers used to experiment with their first killing devices. Mystery shrouds those early days, and from the few remaining notes it seems that they had some truly strange ideas, like platforms that could trap you in a god’s dream or sigils that could conjure thunderstorms. For reasons unknown they eventually abandoned these designs just as they left behind their laboratories. Ironically some of these places became forts where the swarms can relive the history of their previous defeats.

tier2.CN: The Metamorpher Sentries fire in a tight angle. Kill the weakened monsters before they change back to their original shapes. Beware: transmorphed creatures move with a much greater speed!

tier3.CN: Teleporting, rushing, cloaking monsters will try to overrun your defenses. You will have to fight with very limited resources. Salvage Recyclers and Enhancer Beacons will help you in the struggle.

tier4.CN: This map only has Mechanical Tower slots and Mechanical Ground Trap slots, apart from some special traps unique to this map. Tip: keep an eye on the approaching waves, observe which creatures follow which lanes.

name.CN: 第 X 章 - Black Warrens

desc.CN: The archeologists dedicated to the study of the Deathtrap Strongholds have long argued over the question of whether this haunted place was once a factory dedicated to the manufacturing of the occult mechanisms or a place of worship to a long-forgotten machine god. We might never know for sure, but the obsidian platforms, the cast-iron girdles, the chaotic maze of staircases and the gloomy chasms definitely have an air of grim sanctity - a sanctitiy that will be desecrated every time the Chaos Portals disgorge their shrieking hordes onto the black, empty floors.

tier2.CN: Important notice: you'll start this map with extremely limited Essence and you can only gain Essence with the Salvage Recyclers. Always consider carefully what you want to build next.

tier3.CN: Only giants will roam the Warrens this time! You will need strong trap clusters to counter and halt the tide. Use the Metamorpher Sentries cleverly and they will make your job much easier.

tier4.CN: Beware the flying creatures! You'll have to face a lot of those nasties here. And to make it slightly more interesting, there are only Summoning and Mystic Ground trap slots on this map.

desc.CN: The islands of the Ink have seen the rise and fall of many strange empires. Most of these cultures hardly had anything in common, apart from the veneration of their fallen brethren and the need to build grandiose monuments to honor the departed. There are still countless shrines in the Ink dedicated to the dead, most of them lost forever or protected by ancient charms. But this graveyard is too close to the Inkheart, so it became a battleground ages ago... small consolation, but at least the fallen heroes have their monuments prepared for them.

tier2.CN: Unlike most levels, this map grants you clusters where the trap slots converge. You can save a lot of Essence if you build Service Stations first.

tier3.CN: This time you'll face summoners and undead creatures who can call their minions into battle or raise the dead. Prepare for a last ditch effort near your Gate and a stunningly large number of attackers.

tier4.CN: You can only use Tower traps on this map. Forget all your other traps this time: it's a tale of the two... three... well, a lot of towers.

name.CN: 第 XII 章 - Wounded Crag

desc.CN: The closer you get to the Inkheart, the more destructive the pull of the seething darkness becomes. Here you can almost feel the presence of that gaping void out in the mists. Relentless forces have been slowly grinding away this island for millennia: for all we know, this fortress once could have been a pleasure garden, a forested plateau or a castle of ivory and silver, but now it is nothing but a wounded place, floating chunks of lifeless rocks and rusted chains, where the air is heavy with despair.

tier2.CN: Word of advice: focus on Wind of Death traps scattered all over the map. They can turn the tide even in the most desperate situation.

tier3.CN: Brace yourself for the most annoying gathering of monsters: they'll freeze traps and turn brave heroes to ice! Tip: Heat Ray clusters and Squash Traps might come handy.

tier4.CN: This map only allows you to build Mystic Tower traps and Mechanical Ground traps. If you want survive, try to combine these two trap types as often as you can. Good luck!

desc.CN: The Inkheart is a mystery, an absence of something colossal, a gap that distorts time and space in its vicinity. Countless generations of scholars have devoted their lives to the study of this anomaly, and the most plausible theory so far is that the Inkheart is all that remained of a civilization that had manipulated the dream-material of the Ink until they destroyed themselves and left a festering wound in the void that still gorges out their own nightmares from time to time. This fortress is too close to the Inkheart... and the presence of darkness is the most powerful here.

tier2.CN: Heat Ray Sentries increase their damage, so you might want to keep the targeted monster in their crosshairs. They can save you a lot of trouble on this map, where Tower Traps slots are very limited.

tier3.CN: Imprisoned Golems will be your first line of defense on this map, where you will face multiple Bosses at the end of each wave!

tier4.CN: This map only grants you Summoning traps and some special traps unique to this level. Tip: try to build as many kinds of the available traps as you can.

desc.CN: This gigantic, floating chunk of rock with its crudely carved ledges, twisting stairwells and rusty chains was once part of a larger floating island that was eventually worn away by the constant pull of the Inkheart. As it fell apart, the smaller pieces drifted even closer to the whirling darkness, and some of them, like the Mistbound Island, were swallowed by the haze surrounding that ageless anomaly, only to reappear later undamaged, but without any trace of living vegetation.

The necropolises in the Ink are abandoned places, for numerous reasons. Most wanderers avoid these sacred grounds because they respect the silence of the departed. Certain graveyards, on the other hand, have fearsome reputations: the tales of haunted tombs, tainted air and the aura of evil presence repel adventurers and vagabonds. But what happens if one of these infamous graveyard islands happens to float around the Inkheart? Rest assured: nothing good will come out of that.

This gigantic hall used to be part of a larger underground residence, one of the secret palaces built by the royal family of a kingdom long extinct. The echoing, ornamental chamber must have been a ballroom or even a throne room, filled with music, laughter and clamor until the Trapmakers turned it into a mechanical and magical battleground, where the only sound now is the noise of the traps... mingling with the shrieks of dying monsters.

A very long time ago, long before the Inkheart burst for the first time, this chamber was one of the fortified halls that belonged to the Red Knight. He was a legendary champion of justice, who frequently participated in knightly adventures until he failed to return from one his bold quests. This empty hall was later dedicated to the memory of the Red Knight and his fellow champions who always followed him into danger.

This colossal hall of forlorn beauty was built to commemorate the countless lives sacrificed to stop the monstrosities from breaking through to the world beyond. A sudden twist of fate eventually turned the memorial into an actual Stronghold, and the empty eyes of the giant statues seem to look at the battles almost longingly... or with contempt. No one could know for sure.

Hidden in this forgotten armory lies a powerful artifact capable to open a portal to the everyday world. Sealed away the artifact went unnoticed for many decades. But unfortunately nothing lasts forever and the seal weakened. Now all kinds of creatures are getting attracted to the powerful magic emitted by the artifact. This time you don't fight a single force and will need any help you can get.

Recommended: 3-4 players

 - created by Flikk

portal.CN: 在地图中选择你的目的地！

EarlyAccessPopup.CN: 即将公布测试版本，敬请期待！

previewbuild.CN: 预览版的故事到此为止，感谢您试玩本游戏！\n您可以选择立即退出或是继续探索地图。

popup.CN: 数据仅作为参考。敌人实际生命值取决于当前地图的难度等级。
数据仅作为参考。敌人实际攻击力取决于当前地图的难度等级。

SkipToNextChoice.CN: 结束对话/跳到下一个选项

DefaultcontrolsMsg.CN: 你确定要恢复到默认设置吗？

ControlsExceptionMsg.CN: 这个按键已经绑定了其他功能：%s\n你确定要继续使用这个按键吗？

Antialias.CN: 改善多边形模型边缘的视觉效果，使边缘看起来更柔和。提升画面品质可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

Character.CN: 增强模型细节和改善角色的视觉效果。如果游戏画面出现卡顿或延迟，建议降低画面质量。

HDRRender.CN: 增强环境天气视觉效果。需要占用大量显卡内存进行计算。如果游戏画面出现卡顿或延迟，建议关闭此选项。

HighShaders.CN: 增强纹理细节视觉效果，光照阴影和闪电特效。需要占用大量显卡内存进行计算。如果游戏画面出现卡顿或延迟，建议降低画面质量。

DetailedEnvironment.CN: 如果你的设备使用较低性能的显卡，关闭这个选项可以提高游戏性能，使用低画质模式进行游戏。

HighEffects.CN: 开启环境细节特效，以及天空背景的粒子特效。禁用此选项可以显著提升游戏性能。

Reflections.CN: 开启水面环境反射特效。注意，此选项可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

OrganicsPhysics.CN: 开启移动单位经过植物时发生碰撞互动。注意，此选项可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

OrganicsAnimation.CN: 开启环境中草丛和树木的动画。注意，此选项可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

NoSoftCoronas.CN: 开启某些地图下的柔和，模糊效果。

ForceWaitGPU.CN: 强制CPU等待GPU渲染完成时再开始运算下一帧。建议遇到不明原因的卡顿再开启。

MultiGPU.CN: 开启选项将根据双显卡设备SLI/CrossFire配置优化渲染过程，但也会降低生物模拟系统的视觉效果。

Parallax.CN: 增强环境视觉效果。提升画面品质可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

Physics.CN: 此选项可以设置一定区域范围内，受到物理系统影响的游戏单位最大数量。

ShadowDetail.CN: 增强阴影视觉效果。注意，此选项可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

SmoothAnimations.CN: 增强动画视觉效果。注意，此选项可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

SmoothShadows.CN: 增强阴影视觉效果。注意，此选项可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

Texture.CN: 增强纹理视觉效果。提升画面品质可能会导致游戏变卡顿或出现延迟。

VSync.CN: 使显示器延迟画面输入等待显卡完成渲染，提升画面稳定性。\n但也会降低游戏性能，偶尔导致游戏镜头发生延迟。

FPSLimit.CN: 不限制帧率上限可以在高端设备上明显提升游戏流畅度。

affectguiresolution.CN: 调整GUI分辨率与游戏分辨率相同。\n如果你不知道这意味着什么，请不要开启。除非你使用多显卡设备并支持SLI/CrossFire技术。

WindowedStyle.CN: 在窗口模式中进行游戏。

resolution.CN: 如果你使用一个不错的显卡，建议将分辨率设置为高品质。

autoequip.CN: 获得新装备时，如果有空的装备栏将会自动装备。

showenemyhpcsik.CN: 持续显示敌人生命条（仅在敌人受伤时显示）

showalliedhpcsik.CN: 持续显示盟友的生命值。

autoequipchange.CN: 获得新装备时，如果品质比现有装备好，将自动替换。

floatingbattletext.CN: 在屏幕上显示战斗文本信息。

floatingtextsize.CN: 缩放屏幕上的战斗文本信息。

generaltextsize.CN: 缩放屏幕上所有文本（需要重启游戏）

showtutorial.CN: 游戏过程中是否会出现教程帮助。

showenemyhitpoints.CN: 在敌人血条显示当前具体生命值。

autolootpotions.CN: 当你的角色经过生命药水时，会自动捡起。

lootalwaysvisible.CN: 持续显示地面上的物品名称。即使按下Alt键也不会隐藏。

language.CN: 选择游戏语言（需要重启游戏）

force32bit.CN: 在游戏启动前运行 _86.exe 启动游戏。

floatingessencetext.CN: 杀死敌人时显示获得精华数量。

showtutorial_basic.CN: 不再显示教程。你可以随时从游戏设置中重新开启。

hidenews.CN: 隐藏标题画面中的新闻面板。

ControllerEnabled.CN: 开启手柄支持。注意，需要先连接手柄再进入游戏。

willtakeffectonnextstartmsg.CN: 某些选项需要下次进入游戏才能生效，确定要继续吗？

controlscannotchangetoselected.CN: 这个按键在游戏中有特殊用途，\n请选择其他按键。

noaudioinitialized.CN: 声音系统初始化失败。请找到游戏安装目录 InstallUtils 文件夹安装 DirectX 运行库。 如果问题仍然存在，请尝试更新声卡音频驱动。

Checksum_error.CN: 版本不匹配！\n你当前版本：%X\n服务器版本：%X

connection_refused.CN: 连接被拒绝。服务器人数已满，或已经不存在。

requirements_failed.CN: 你不符合加入此服务器的要求。

hardcore_yes.CN: 只有硬核玩家可以加入。

normal_campaign.CN: 竞技玩家不能加入正常模式的对局。

veteran_campaign.CN: 只有竞技玩家可以加入这场游戏。

campaign.CN: 这个模式目前你还不能玩。

disconnected_question.CN: 你想以离线状态继续游戏吗？

advance_level_too_low.CN: 你暂时不能加入这场游戏，因为你的角色还没解锁这部分的剧情章节。

teleporting.CN: 你即将在短时间内被传送。

kick.CN: 你已被房主踢出服务器。

target_not_connected.CN: 对方还没有连接到服务器

invalid_character.CN: 这是个无效角色！你不能使用无效角色参与PVP战斗！

connected.CN: 有玩家正在尝试加入这场游戏！

restart_steam.CN: 检测到本次游戏不是从 Steam 启动的。这意味着你将无法获得任何成就，无法使用 DLC 内容，也无法使用网络联机功能。你是否打算重新打开 Steam ？

restart_steam_failed.CN: 无法启动游戏。请检查 Steam 安装目录。如果问题仍然存在，请尝试重新安装 Steam ，然后检验本游戏文件的完整性。

relayed_connection.CN: 与该用户的连接被其他端口占用。在某些情况下，这可能会造成不必要的网络延迟。为了获得更好的游戏体验，请尝试打开防火墙放行 6329-6330 和 61111 端口。

desc.CN: 身躯强悍的老战士，主要进行近距离攻击。擅长防守阵地，吸引敌人将他们控制在陷阱范围内发动强力打击。
娴熟运用各种元素法术和技能的魔法师，擅于对付集中在范围里的多个敌人。但在近距离战斗中非常脆弱。
身手敏捷的猎人，擅长使用远程武器发射强大的毒素攻击。拥有隐身的能力，脱离敌人攻击并提高移动速度。

Connect.CN: 当前没有手柄连接，请重新接上手柄！

Choose.CN: 检测到有多个手柄连接，请选择其中一个，并按下任意键！

desc.CN: 敌人只有 30% 最大生命值，最多造成40%攻击力伤害。你的角色生命值回复能力提升 2% 。但完成战役后最多只能获得 1 星评价。
敌人只有 70% 最大生命值，最多造成 70% 攻击力伤害。但完成战役后最多只能获得 2 星评价。
敌人拥有 100% 最大生命值，可以造成 100% 攻击力伤害。完成战役后可以得到 3 星评价。

Popup.CN: 献给那些总是自以为是，认为自己见识过任何硬核 ARPG 游戏的死忠玩家：我们已经迫不及待地想带你到博加维亚长长见识，迎接你的新挑战！\n（物品掉落率比平时高很多）
你将获得更多的战利品，这意味着它的难度更具有挑战性。但如果你在游戏中死亡，你的角色将永远的死去。

msg_invalid_character.CN: 当前角色被确认为无效角色。 因此，你不能加入 PVP 游戏对局。 你是否打算重置能力值和技能点，调整为有效的数值范围？ （警告，此操作一旦确认将无法恢复！）

DeleteConfirm.CN: 你确定要删除此文件吗？

SaveConfirm.CN: 文件已经存在，确定要覆盖吗？

overwrite.CN: 档案中已存在 %s 的记录。如果你继续使用这个名称创建角色，之前的存档将被自动覆盖。 你确定自己的脑子现在非常清醒，并且准备好面对即将造成的后果了吗？

delete.CN: 确定要删除这个角色吗？

tooltip_controller.CN: 编辑器尚不支持手柄。请断开手柄连接后重启游戏。 (或在选项中禁用手柄支持)

desc.CN: 欢迎来到死亡陷阱! 你需要守护我们的前方阵地，阻止来自墨水心世界的怪物入侵，它们世界发展超越了我们许多，若是放任不管很快就会吞噬掉我们的家园。 所以，必须击退它们！
你的第一个任务，就是保卫黑暗沼泽的据点。 点击这里查看关于这场战斗的任务细节。
Select the difficulty level of the assignment, then click Battle to start. Later you will have the option to choose between different game modes.
Battles in Deathtrap are tower defense-style skirmishes where you have to fight waves of monsters with traps and your character.
据点上方的能量屏障是一道空间传送门。那些怪物会试图突破这里，借助门入侵我们的现实世界。
如果怪物突破了大门（或者你的角色死亡），就会消耗大门耐久。 绿色数值条，表示大门目前还剩多少点数。\n红色数值条，表示当前回合还有多少怪物存活。
The red line that runs into the gate shows the path the monsters will take to get there. Follow it using the Left Mouse Button and find a suitable spot to fight.
This looks like a good place to build some traps. Click on a mechanical pylon or floor cover with the Middle Mouse Button to access the trap build menu.
Building traps costs Essence. You get a set amount before each wave and you gain some more by killing monsters.
Besides traps, you can fight monsters with your. These are activated by the Left and Right mouse buttons as well as the keys 1-4.
If you are hurt by enemies you can quickly regain your health by drinking potions. Note that after drinking a Healing Potion you have to wait some time before you can drink another one.
The Sorceress activates her battle using Mana. This is a resource that regenerates continuously, but the rate of regeneration depends on the situation.
Standing still the Sorceress regenerates at full rate (20/sec by default). Performing any action imposes a -40% penalty and any enemies nearby impose a further -50%. These modifiers are cumulative.
The Mercenary fuels his combat using Rage. This resource is generated by killing enemies (at a rate of 5/kill by default). This can be increased with and item enchantments.

The Marksman needs Focus to activate combat. This resource does not regenerate on its own. To regain Focus the Marksman must cloak himself which automatically happens when he spends 2 seconds without attacking and away from enemies.
While cloaked, enemies ignore the Marksman. He also receives +30% to his Movement speed, 4% Health regeneration and regains Focus at a rate of 10/second by default.
Once you’ve familiarised yourself with your and built enough traps, press the "Start Battle" button to begin.
You can get detailed information on the next wave by opening the Wave Info window.
The map gives you an overview of the monster routes and trap locations. The list on the right shows the general monster composition of the next wave.
By hovering over the Chaos Portal icons you can see the number and type of enemies that will arrive from each gate in the current turn.
You have gained enough experience to increase your and traps. Click one of the „+” signs.
Your character has a range of available to learn or improve. Left Click to spend points, Right Click to withdraw them.

Here you can improve your traps by purchasing battle upgrades or general upgrades for them. Battle upgrades can be built during missions to enhance traps, while general upgrades provide permanent bonuses once purchased. Left Click to spend points, Right Click to withdraw them.
This is where you can sell the items you collect during battles or buy new ones. Keep an eye out for special offers which allow you to equip yourself with unusually stronger items.
Instead of buying items, you can forge new ones yourself from available recipes. This requires both gold and shards.
Shards can be found in battles, but are mostly gained by breaking down items. Right Click on an item in your inventory space and press "Salvage Item" to do this.

Many levels have treasure chests that you can loot for extra items and gold. To open them, you must first defeat their guardians who will drop the key for their chest. Note that you can only defeat the guardians during waves, when they are not in Ghost form.

Most traps have a damage type displayed in their tooltip. This determines what type of creatures the trap is effective against. This level has Giant type creatures that are vulnerable to Concentrated damage.
The next wave contains some flying enemies! Always pay special attention to flying enemies because ground traps aren't activated by them and do no damage to them.
If you find yourself in a tough situation, you can slow the game with the game speed buttons. You can also manipulate the game speed with the + and - keys.

Some battles provide Quests for extra rewards. To complete a Quest, you must also successfully complete the mission that contains it. Also, note that some quests only appear on normal and hard difficulty levels.
You can rearrange your by clicking on one of these slots and then clicking on a skill you wish to assign to it. Note that you can only assign active to hotkeys, not passsive.
Sometimes you may find attacking without accidentally moving your character difficult. You can remedy this by holding down Shift which will cause your character to hold ground while attacking.
You have unlocked five new levels! They are marked with a golden cup. Note that these levels can only be played in scenario mode.
You have a Godlike item in your inventory! These items can be made exceptionally powerful if properly upgraded with additional enchantments. You can upgrade Godlike items in the crafting window.
